meanings.definition: To smile broadly or widely, especially in a mocking or triumphant manner.
meanings.sent1: She outgrins her friends when she wins a game.
meanings.sent2: The clown outgrins the audience with his funny antics.
meanings.sent3: His outgrins during the competition made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her outgrins shone brighter than the sun on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The villain's outgrins revealed his sinister intentions.

meanings.definition: To surpass in grinning or smiling.
meanings.sent1: The little girl outgrins her older brother in photos.
meanings.sent2: His outgrins always light up the room with joy.
meanings.sent3: The cat outgrins the dog in a playful showdown.
meanings.sent4: Her outgrins outshine even the happiest of smiles.
meanings.sent5: The outgrins of the winning team outshone their opponents.
